name: Shovelware
description:
Controls:

Movement: Arrow keys/ WASD

Interact: E

Attack: Space or Click

Open/Close Inventory: Tab

Move Stuff in Inventory: Click (Do not drag)

Rotate through equipped weapons: R

Interact with lanterns to use light cores from the inventory. Plant seeds or weapons in farm plots by standing near one with inventory open and moving them into the inventory 2x2 pop up. Interact with the sun dial to speed up time during the day.
